Samuel Kwado Yamoah (amụrụ Mee 1956) bụ onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Ghana bụrụkwa onye otu nzuko omeiwu mbụ nke Republic nke anọ na-anọchite anya mpaghara Ahafo Ano North na mpaghara Ashanti.Ọ nọchitere anya National Democratic Congress
A mụrụ Yamoah na 16 Mee 1956 na Tepa na mpaghara Ashanti nke Ghana
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Osei Kyeretwie ebe ọ nwetara GCE Ordinary Level.

A họpụtara Yamoah ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu na tiketi nke National Democratic Congress maka Ahafo Ano North Constituency na Ashanti Region nke Ghana n'oge ntuli aka ndị omeiwu Ghana na Disemba 1992. Baffour Annor nọchiri ya mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ otu oge

N'oge ntuli aka Ghana nke afọ 1996, Baffour Annor nwetara vootu 12,536 n'ime ngụkọta vootu ziri ezi nke na-anọchite anya 45.70% karịa James Brownford Donkor nke New Patriotic Party onye nwetara vootu 9,628 na-anọchi anya 35.10% na Kwabena Nketia nke People's National Congress onye nwetara voolu 355 na-anọchitere 1.30% nke ngụkọta nke vootu ziri ike.
Ewezuga ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, Yamoah bụ onye ọchụnta ego
O nweela ahụmịhe ọrụ na ụlọ akụ, na iwu ụlọ
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ njem, ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi bọọlụ.
Yamoah bụ Onye Kraịst ma ọ lụọla nwaanyị
